title: The Incredible Edible Toe
description: Augustus Hall Vanderswall made a vow when he was small, that if his bed was ever made he'd never leave the 2nd grade... Come on in and have a seat I've got folks you'd love to meet! Find out what happened to good ole' Augustus, or meet that old goat Molly Mox. Read all about Sally Scrum and her 60 kittens, and learn about Allergies in this wacky new book of poetry from children's poet Asher Jones.
author: Asher Jones
